languages.text: {n}Маражай склоняется к вам, в его глазах тлеет интерес.{/n} "И о чем же ты хочешь поговорить, {name}?"
{n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай склоняется к вам, в его глазах тлеет интерес.{/n} "И о чем же ты хочешь поговорить, {name}?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia ti con interés ardiente en sus ojos.{/n} «¿Y de qué quieres hablar, {name}?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se inclina hacia ti con interés ardiente en sus ojos.{/n} «¿Y de qué quieres hablar, {name}?».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋朝你靠了过来，眼神中燃起了兴趣。{/n}“你想谈什么事情，{name}？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋朝你靠了过来，眼神中燃起了兴趣。{/n}“你想谈什么事情，{name}？”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは好奇心に目を輝かせながら、あなたの方に身を傾ける。{/n}「それで、どんなことを話したいんだ、{name}？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは好奇心に目を輝かせながら、あなたの方に身を傾ける。{/n}「それで、どんなことを話したいんだ、{name}？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai se penche vers vous, le regard brasillant de curiosité.{/n} « De quoi s'agit-il, {name} ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, {name}?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai se penche vers vous, le regard brasillant de curiosité.{/n} « De quoi s'agit-il, {name} ? »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Marazhai neigt sich zu dir. Interesse funkelt in seinen Augen.{/n} "Und worüber wollt Ihr sprechen, {name}?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, {name}?"

languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai leans down toward you, interest smouldering in his eyes.{/n} "And what is it you want to talk about, ?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai ilgi dolu, alev alev gözleriyle sana doğru eğiliyor.{/n} "Ne konuşacaksın bakayım {name}?"
